input.sentences: today we are trying to hatch two organization eggs .
first the eggs were heated up mildly .
out came two chicks . one black and one brown .
everyone was amazed that two chicks were born
output.sentences: The organization manages an incubator to hatch eggs.
When mildly heated, the eggs begin to hatch in the incubator.
The eggs crack open more widely to reveal what is inside.
Chicks, one brown and one black, emerge from the shells.
We are truly amazed that these chicks were born from chocolate eggs.
